member.name: T:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController
member.summary: Represents the API endpoint for managing committees and their members.

member.summary: Represents a controller for managing committees.
member.param: The repository for managing committees.
The repository for managing committee members.
The mapper for mapping models to entities and vice versa.

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.GetCommittees
member.summary: Returns a list of all committees.

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.GetCommittee(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the details of a specific committee.
member.param: The ID of the committee

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.PatchCommittee(System.Guid,Administration.API.Models.Committee.CommitteePatchRequestModel)
member.summary: Updates the specified committee with the given changes.
member.param: The ID of the committee to update
The changes to apply to the committee

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.PatchCommitteeMember(System.Guid,System.Guid,Administration.API.Models.CommitteeMember.CommitteeMemberPatchRequestModel)
member.summary: Updates the specified member of a committee with the given changes.
member.param: The ID of the committee to update the member for
The ID of the member to update
The changes to apply to the member

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.PostCommittee(Administration.API.Models.Committee.CommitteePostRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new committee.
member.param: The model for creating a committee.

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.PostCommitteeMember(System.Guid,Administration.API.Models.CommitteeMember.CommitteeMemberPostRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new committee member for a committee.
member.param: The ID of the committee to which the member belongs.
The model for creating a committee member.

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.DeleteCommittee(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a committee by ID.
member.param: The ID of the committee to delete.
member.returns: A response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.CommitteesController.DeleteCommitteeMember(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a committee member by ID.
member.param: The ID of the committee to which the member belongs.
The ID of the member to delete.
member.returns: A response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

member.summary: Returns the document with the specified id.

member.summary: Updates the document with the specified id.
member.param: The id of the document to update.
The DocumentPatchRequestModel with the updated values.
member.returns: The DocumentPatchResponseModel with the updated values, or NotFound if the document is not found.

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.PostDocument(Administration.API.Models.Document.DocumentPostRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new document.
member.param: The DocumentPostRequestModel with the values for the new document.
member.returns: The DocumentPostResponseModel for the newly created document.

member.name: M:Administration.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.DeleteDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a Document by ID
member.param: The ID of the Document to delete
member.returns: NoContent if the Document is successfully deleted, NotFound if the Document is not found
